00036 CanaryOptions::CanaryOptions()
00037 {
00038   verbosity = 1;
00039   force = false;
00040   blockSize = 0;
00041   precision = 6;
00042   ccMDChpOutput = true;
00043   tableOutput = false;
00044   aptSummarizeAnalysis = "quant-norm.target=1000,pm-only,plier.optmethod=1,expr.genotype=true";
00045 
00046   // set all the tuneables to defaults.
00047   aptCanaryAnalysis = "af-weight=1.0,TOL=1e-3,hwe_tol=1e-4,hwe_tol2=1e-11,fraction-giveaway-0=0.20,fraction-giveaway-1=0.10,fraction-giveaway-2=0.15,fraction-giveaway-3=0.20,fraction-giveaway-4=0.30,min-fill-prop=0.10,conf-interval-half-width=1.959963984540054,inflation=1.3,min-cluster-variance=0.0001,pseudopoint-factor=100,regularize_variance_factor=0.4";
00048   // ensure that the defaults are set from this string
00049   setTuneableStr();
00050 }
00051 
00052 CanaryOptions::~CanaryOptions()
00053 {
00054   // empty

00059 #define SET_TUNE_INT(ARG_STR,ARG_VAR)                                   \
00060   {                                                                     \
00061     if (var_name==ARG_STR) {                                            \
00062       bool ok;                                                          \
00063       ARG_VAR=Convert::toIntCheck(val,&ok);                             \
00064       if (!ok) {                                                        \
00065         Err::errAbort("Cant convert canary tunable value: '"+val+"'."); \
00066       }                                                                 \
00067       return;                                                           \
00068     }                                                                   \
00069   }
00070 #define SET_TUNE_DOUBLE(ARG_STR,ARG_VAR)                                \
00071   {                                                                     \
00072     if (var_name==ARG_STR) {                                            \
00073       bool ok=true;                                                     \
00074       ARG_VAR=Convert::toDoubleCheck(val,&ok);                          \
00075       if (!ok) {                                                        \
00076         Err::errAbort("Cant convert canary tunable value: '"+val+"'."); \
00077       }                                                                 \
00078       return;                                                           \
00079     }                                                                   \
00080   }
00081 
00082 void
00083 CanaryOptions::setTuneable(const std::string& var_name,const std::string& val)
00084 {
00085   // for debugging.
00086   // printf("### CanaryOptions::setTuneable('%s','%s')\n",var_name.c_str(),val.c_str());
00087   //
00088   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("af-weight",tune_af_weight);
00089   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("TOL",tune_TOL);
00090   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("hwe_tol",tune_hwe_tol);
00091   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("hwe_tol2",tune_hwe_tol2);
00092   //
00093   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("fraction-giveaway-0",tune_fraction_giveaway_0);
00094   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("fraction-giveaway-1",tune_fraction_giveaway_1);
00095   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("fraction-giveaway-2",tune_fraction_giveaway_2);
00096   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("fraction-giveaway-3",tune_fraction_giveaway_3);
00097   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("fraction-giveaway-4",tune_fraction_giveaway_4);
00098   //
00099   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("min-fill-prop",tune_min_fill_prop);
00100   //
00101   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("conf-interval-half-width",tune_conf_interval_half_width);
00102   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("inflation",tune_inflation);
00103   //
00104   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("min-cluster-variance",tune_min_cluster_variance);
00105   //
00106   SET_TUNE_DOUBLE("regularize_variance_factor",tune_regularize_variance_factor);
00107   //
00108   SET_TUNE_INT("pseudopoint-factor",tune_pseudopoint_factor);
00109   //
00110   Err::errAbort("Bad tunable name: '"+var_name+"'"+
00111                 "Please see the help for a list of valid canary tunables." );
00112 }
00113 // dont need anymore.
00114 #undef SET_TUNE_INT
00115 #undef SET_TUNE_DOUBLE

00117 void
00118 //CanaryOptions::setTuneableStr(const std::string& keyval_str)
00119 //{
00120 CanaryOptions::setTuneableStr()
00121 {
00122 //  if (keyval_str=="") {
00123   if (aptCanaryAnalysis=="") {
00124     return;
00125   }
00126 
00127   // make a copy just in case
00128   std::string keyval_str = aptCanaryAnalysis;
00129   
00130   std::vector<std::string> keyval_vec;
00131   // split on ","
00132   Util::chopString(keyval_str,',',keyval_vec);
00133   for (int i=0;i<keyval_vec.size();i++) {
00134     std::string kv_str=keyval_vec[i];
00135     Util::trimString(kv_str);
00136     std::vector<std::string> kv_vec;
00137     Util::chopString(kv_str,'=',kv_vec);
00138     //
00139     if (kv_vec.size()!=2) {
00140       Err::errAbort("CanaryOptions::setTuneable(): Cant parse: '"+kv_str+"' of '"+keyval_str+"'");
00141     }
00142     setTuneable(kv_vec[0],kv_vec[1]);
00143   }
00144 }
